• Partner with product, engineering, and marketing teams to solve complex challenges with data-driven solutionsAnalyze large datasets to generate insights that guide product, platform, and business decisionsDefine data requirements and support implementation for new product launchesBuild scalable solutions to surface key metrics, dashboards, and reporting toolsDesign and run experiments to improve user and advertiser outcomesWrite efficient code (SQL, Python, R) for data extraction, analysis, and modelingCommunicate insights clearly to both technical and non-technical partnersMentor peers while driving projects from scoping to delivery You have 4+ years of data science experience and a degree in a quantitative fieldYou are skilled in SQL, Python or R, and comfortable working with large, complex datasetsYou have experience with data visualization tools (Tableau, Looker, matplotlib)You bring strong knowledge of statistical analysis, machine learning, and advanced analyticsYou can translate complex ideas for diverse stakeholdersYou are a creative problem-solver who thrives in ambiguity and takes ownership from idea to impactYou are curious, collaborative, and excited to help shape the future of Spotify Advertising.
